EmailTemplate.name: 16.CEM.MotiveCDP.none.D.G.N.2315.Email 4 - Data sheet - Nokia Motive connected d
EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud-based connected device management from Motive
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> The industry’s leading device manager Cloud-based solution securely manages devices through their entire lifecycle The Nokia Motive Connected Device Platform is a complete platform for end-to-end customer care. It manages every kind of connected device from detection and onboarding to security updates. Consolidate all device management on this industry-leading platform. Cloud-based, it offers low risk startup costs and scales with your business. Its end-to-end approach offers full device lifecycle management for millions of devices.
Get all the specs <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/196246]]> on this industry-leading Connected Device Platform. Connect with us © 2016 Nokia. Contact us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Privacy policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
